channel.title: NPC's + Auto-Restarters?
channel.description: hey how and where can i find and change wut the npcs say...and how can i get a autorestarter??? whoever helps get's admin on my server...

item.title: NPC's + Auto-Restarters?
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBones BloodyBones
item.description:
@BloodyBones wrote:

Or to just change what a npc says go to npchandler and search for what the npc says and change it.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's + Auto-Restarters?
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Open up npc handler and search moo

After the last “}” pressenter and add something like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == npcidhere) { if (misc.random2(60) <= 10) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "messagehere!"; } }

you should have an antilag.java

change ResetTimer += 1; if(ResetTimer >= 999999)

To the time ( In seconds )

Read full topic
